title: PlayStation's New Studio is More Important Than We Think - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.11.22
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Assassin's Creed and potentially other old Ubisoft games becoming unplayable, Haven Studios officially joining PlayStation, and Respawn working on a singleplayer Apex Universe game.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:55 - Housekeeping
Shout-out to Prime Gaming for sponsoring our streams. To celebrate Prime Day you can start Freeloading Over 30 Games With Prime Gaming for Prime Day 2022! And then you’ll also be able to claim additional games on Prime Day - July 12 and July 13, which will include AAA titles like Mass Effect Legendary Edition, GRID Legends, Need for Speed Heat, and Star Wars Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy, Star Wars Jedi Knight II - Jedi Outcast, and Star Wars Republic Commando. So check out the link in the description to start Freeloading games now!
HEY LA, wanna hang out with Greg, Joey, and SnowBikeMike?! Xbox and Kinda Funny will be taking over the Fonda Theater in Los Angeles for the As Dusk Falls Launch Event!. A live We Have Cool Friends! A Kinda Funny Gamescast! A Live Let’s Play! Wanna come?! kindafunny.com/xbox for all the details!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Gordon McGuire, & Al Tribesman
The Roper Report  -
00:05:20 - Ubisoft titles pulled from Steam may lock out players who bought them - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:09:32 - Do you think this just encourages piracy? - Best Friends Q:Glutenfull
00:18:34 - The deal has officially closed: Haven is a part of PlayStation Studios - Christopher Dring @ GiBiz
00:28:22 - Ad
00:31:30 - Respawn is hiring for an Apex game that's not Apex Legends - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:40:20 - The Last of Us Part 1 Remake is not a "cash grab", says developer - Vikki Blake @ Eurogamer
00:46:15 - Hideo Kojima is tired of you bitches - Emma Roth @ The Verge
00:49:00 - Out today
00:54:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Bless and Gary

Blessing and Tim talk about Assassin's Creed and potentially other old Ubisoft games becoming unplayable, Haven Studios officially joining PlayStation, and Respawn working on a singleplayer Apex Universe game.

Shout-out to Prime Gaming for sponsoring our streams. To celebrate Prime Day you can start Freeloading Over 30 Games With Prime Gaming for Prime Day 2022!
